job_title: SQL Server DBA + IBM MQ consultant

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field

jd: From: sangya kumari nahak, adventa sangya@adventatech.com Reply to: sangya@adventatech.com Title: SQL Server DBA + IBM MQ consultantLocation: NYC Onsite (Need local with DL)Duration: 6 MonthsVisa: USC/GCMOI: SkypeMust have SQL Server DBA experienceMust have IBM MQ experience (if they only have one, then it’s an automatic rejection)Must currently located in general NYC areaMust be able to work 5-day On-Site.Domain-Financial Services firmJOB DESCRIPTIONServe as the Subject Matter Expert (SME) for IBM MQ.Establish and maintain IBM MQ instances across on-prem and cloud (Azure).Develop and maintain processes for monitoring and upgrading IBM MQ environments.Create MQ Consumers to write to MS SQL Server, handling XML parsing at scale.Provide Level 1 support for IBM MQ-related issues.Collaborate on risk management and ensure compliance with regulatory standards.Proficient in IBM MQ on Windows environments.Experience with ASP.NET MVC / ASP.NET Core, C#, and SQL Server.Strong scripting abilities (Python or PowerShell).Familiarity with capital markets and post-trade workflows.Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.Experience working in both on-prem and cloud environments (Azure or AWS experience preferred).Knowledge of Agile SDLC and DevOps practices is a plus.
